publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1166 Richard Lochhead: Draft Agriculture and Horticulture Development Board Order 2007—That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the draft Agriculture and Horticulture Development Board Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: Michael Russell*

S3M-1166 Richard Lochhead: Draft Agriculture and Horticulture Development Board Order 2007—That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the draft Agriculture and Horticulture Development Board Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: Michael Russell
